West Boise Area of Drilling concern extends for approximately 2 1/2 miles in a northwesterly direction for Boise Towne Square Mall to Five Mile Road northe of fairview Avenue </abstract><purpose>The area of drilling concern desigination is designed to protect public health and to prevent waste or contamination of ground or surface water because of factors such as aquifer pressure, vertical depth of the aquifer, warm or hot ground water, or contaminated ground or surface waters. Aquifers areas designated as an area of drilling concern have additional well construction requirements that must be followed.  The statute applies to both new wells being drilled and to the deeping or modification of an existing well. </purpose></descript><citation><citeinfo><origin>Idaho Department of Water Resources</origin><pubdate>Unknowwn</pubdate><ftname Sync="TRUE">AreaofDrillingConcern</ftname><geoform Sync="TRUE">vector digital data</geoform><onlink>http://www.idwr.idaho.gov/gisdata/gis_data.htm</onlink><title>Area of Drilling Concern</title><pubinfo><publish>Idaho Department of Water Resources</publish><pubplace>Boise, ID</pubplace></pubinfo></citeinfo></citation><timeperd><current>publication date</current><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>unknowwn</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo></timeperd><status><progress>In work</progress><update>Unknown</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc Sync="TRUE">-116.493614</westbc><eastbc Sync="TRUE">-115.932004</eastbc><northbc Sync="TRUE">47.576794</northbc><southbc Sync="TRUE">43.600155</southbc></bounding><lboundng><leftbc Sync="TRUE">2312446.782588</leftbc><rightbc Sync="TRUE">2344084.234042</rightbc><bottombc Sync="TRUE">1380311.868686</bottombc><topbc Sync="TRUE">1821570.953993</topbc></lboundng></spdom><keywords><theme><themekt>ESRI Geography Network Thesaurus</themekt><themekey>Drilling concern</themekey></theme><place><placekt>None</placekt></place></keywords><accconst>Public</accconst><natvform Sync="TRUE">Shapefile</natvform><secinfo><sechandl>The Idaho Department of Water Resources is  making this data available as a public service.
